roleset.name: devise
roleset.note: MACHINATE-V NOTES: Automatically created based on framefiles: feign (55.5), hand corrected by Katie. Member of VNcls establish-55.5. (from machinate.01-v)

example.name: devise or organize
example.text: But Collins-1 feels the need *-1 to machinate the game to a degree that has players rollings their eyes.

example.name: consipire
example.text: My advise is * don't machinate over the gristle.
